updates.description: Migrated the stored files to a different repository, to make the website easier to deploy. This may lead to issues when accessing file, please message me any problems you find! :)
Added a 'go back' button when you focus on folders, returning to the last focus you were on, NOT the folder above.
Really embarrassing bug with the copy button for the clock fixed. Also improved clock visuals.
Small visual improvements, rearranged the scripts, and modified the instructions document.
Fixed a bug with focusing folders, because read/review files that were not in focus did not exist, it threw an error and stopped all read/review files being opened.
Added small d's requested stuffs. Added literature folder.
Added focusing folders, and added this updates feature, showing a popup when a new update is made.
Modified code to make focusing on folders possible, but did not implement yet.
